metadata.synopsis: AD occasionally played as the player solves the puzzle, providing feedback to the player.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to S_COL_Vault_PuzzleButton3_0f07d5be-159d-48f4-94c4-4c9ee0234423Click on the button.Start solving the puzzle.Solve for at least one of the nodes.Continue clicking nodes.

0.speaker: Mind of the Vault
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Partial lucidity (3 out of 3 brain parts activated; fully lucid in following lines as puzzle is now solved)NodeContext: Mechanically distorted speech; almost "normal"

1.speaker: Mind of the Vault
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Senseless babble (1 out of 3 brain parts activated)NodeContext: Mechanically distorted nonsense babble

2.speaker: Mind of the Vault
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Limited sense (2 out of 3 brain parts activated)NodeContext: Mechanically distorted speech; starting to just about form actual words
